Class Effect_2

  • java.lang.Object
    • ActionBarActivity
      • Effect_2

  • public class Effect_2
extends ActionBarActivity
    Activity for the delay effect

    This activity records a buffer of audio from the microphone, applies the signal processing to apply delay to the audio and then plays the audio back through the speakers. The record and play back functionality was modified from http://eurodev.blogspot.com/2009/09/raw-audio-manipulation-in-android.html

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)

      • record

        public void record(int frequency,
          int channelConfig,
          int audioEncoding)
        Records 16-bit PCM audio at a given sample frequency to a file on the Android external storage device. This record method uses the minimum buffer size.
        Parameters:
        frequency - Frequency to sample audio
        channelConfig - Audio channel configuration
        audioEncoding - Audio encoding type (wav,pcm,etc...)

      • play

        public void play()
        This function calls the delay function and then plays the processed audio back to the user.

      • applyDelay

        public short[] applyDelay(double delayTime,
                 short[] music,
                 int musicLength)
        This method applies a delay algorithm to an array of audio. It works by simply copying the array elements and adding them back to the array at a position of a given delay offset.
        Parameters:
        delayTime - Delay time for the delay in ms
        music - Audio array to be processed
        musicLength - Length of audio array to be processed
        Returns:
        Returns the processed audio array

      • startRecording

        public void startRecording()
        Called when the start button is clicked, this method calls the record method

        Currently unable to have buttons start effects

      • playDistortion

        public void playDistortion()
        Called when the Play button is clicked, this method calls the play method. Can only call play is recording is finished.

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
